TopicTitle: Video Wednesdays: TMRO Interviews Scott Manley

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_ni713qzfz11rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="236" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/FNrThpiz-Lc" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>Weekly internet talk show, <strong>TMRO</strong> recently interviewed Scott Manley about his beginnings in streaming and of course, all things KSP. Get some insight from the KSP master, himself, then stick around for the latest space news and views.</p>

Thanks for the link. I hadn't heard of these guys, and it was both a good inteview and a relatively interesting show to plug. Kudos.

Edited January 15, 2015 by BlackAdder128

"KSP is really good for its areodynamics engine..." -Scott Manley

Are you sure that your not talking about version 0.91 Scott?
